873990.name: Multiverse
873990.description:
MULTIVERSE: Build, Explore, Connect.

Leave your mark on a living world.

Step into Multiverse, a massive, player-driven open-world sandbox where - you, the player - can claim a kingdom and customize it as you see fit. This shared world city builder lets you shape the world your way. Design breathtaking cities, craft interactive experiences, or claim a plot of land and make it entirely your own. Every city, every forest, every lake, and every storefront creation, exists in a persistent world shared with thousands of players who are shaping their world together.

Journey across Infiniverse, a vast network of player-made cities, storefronts, and private locations. From futuristic skylines and neon metropolises to art galleries, games, and a massive planetarium. Discover something new every time you log inâ€¦ or start your own adventure from scratch using intuitive tools and free templates that make building fast and fun. With over 1 million user-generated locations, Multiverse is sure to have something just for you.

Whether youâ€™re here to create, explore, experiment with AI-powered characters, or even showcase your brand or art, Multiverse gives you total freedom. Build solo, team up with friends, or open your world to the community and watch it grow.

The frontier is open. Claim your land. Build your dream. Join the creators shaping the Multiverse together.Â
